data.title: Francis Conway – The Founder Of Port Conway, Virginia
data.meta_description: In 1783, Francis Conway laid out the areas of a town that the Virginia legislature would establish in the following year as Port Conway.
data.text:
In 1783, Francis Conway laid out the areas of a town that the Virginia legislature would establish in the following year as Port Conway.
